ability.name: Concentrate
ability.description: * Place Major Arcana cards on Concentrate. * Cards sitting on Concentrate remain there. * When there are 2 (Wise: 1, Foolish: 3) cards on Concentrate: * discard all cards on Concentrate and * draw a new card * if Clever, deal 1 Magic Damage and gain 1 Shield * if Charming, you may choose to make an Adversary redraw their Intent
ability.flavor: You take a moment to focus: the world slows down around you.
